title: Saraswati Puja Special: Malpua
text:
How to make Malpua Step 1 
For making sugar syrup, place water in a pan over medium flame. Add sugar in it and stir until fully dissolved. Step 2 
Then add milk and stir again, after a few minutes remove the scum that rises to the top. Remove the pan from the flame and keep aside. Step 3 
Mix maida, rava, khoya, baking powder, fennel seeds, cardamom powder and milk. Ensure the mixture is of pouring consistency and not too thick. Step 4 
Now heat ghee in a pan over low flame. Pour a ladleful of the mixture and spread evenly. Step 5 
Cook till it is light brown on both sides. Remove the cooked malpua and drain the excess ghee. Step 6 
Drop the malpua in sugar syrup and let it be there for 10 minutes. Repeat the same with the remaining batter. Step 7
